title: Can you see it? Res Lease in Buda. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Beautiful 1 story, 3 beds, 2 baths home in Buda, TX now available to lease!!
Located in Old West Trail neighbourhood and close to Tom Green Elementary School.

As you cross the front door this house welcomes you to its spacious open living space followed by the well-designed kitchen, with natural wood cabinetry, plenty counterspace to utilize, equipped with a fridge, gas range and a dishwasher, as well as an area that fits an eat-in kitchen table to enjoy family meals at all times.
Some of this home features are its carpeted flooring in all bedrooms and tiled floor in kitchen, all bathrooms and laundry room.
The main bedroom has a ceiling-fan, a walk-in closet and a full-bathroom with double vanity, wood cabinetry and a bathtub perfect to relax after a long day of work.
Tour and apply to this one today before it’s gone!
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
